name: Meet The Watchmen
description:
This is a submission for the RPG Mania Jam 2022.

I hand-drawn graphics into RPG Maker MZ and this was the result. The game is unfinished and highly unpolished, but it works as a proof of concept.

It is meant to tell the story of a wake sleeper, who has to face a transonirical entity whilst he fixes his inner, dark corners. Hold to the proof of concept!
